branchCategory.name: LEY, Electric Actuator, Rod Type, AC Servo Motor (100/200W)
branchCategory.description: The AC servo version of the LEY rod features an AC servo motor instead of a DC version. The AC servo motor enables higher speed, acceleration, and pushing force, as well as a size 63 model not available in a DC version. The drivers are pulse input type, with both incremental and absolute encoder options and 17- or 18-bit resolution.
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Body sizes: 25, 32 <LI>Maximum work load: 60 kg (horizontal); 46 kg (vertical) <LI>Maximum pushing force: 736 N <LI>Maximum stroke: 500 mm <LI>Positioning repeatability: ±0.02 mm <LI>Motor available with either incremental 17-bit or absolute 18-bit encoder </LI></UL>

breadCrumb.name: LEY, Electric Actuator, Rod Type, AC Servo Motor (100/200W)

relatedProductsItem.name: LECA6 Servo Motor Controller for LEY Series
